summary: Frontend testing of Document Builder page and Login page updates - All features verified working correctly

issues: HTML hydration warning in console for span inside select element - cosmetic only, does not affect functionality

details: Document Builder page at /document-builder loads correctly
Shows all 4 document types: Offer Letter, Appointment Letter, Confirmation Letter, Experience Letter
Each type is selectable with visual feedback (emerald border on selection)
Document Builder nav link appears in sidebar under HR section
Employee dropdown shows all employees (11 active employees found)
Each employee shows: Employee ID (EMP001), Name (Rahul Kumar), Department Badge (Consulting)
Format verified: 'EMP001 Rahul Kumar [Consulting]', 'EMP002 Test Deploy [IT]', etc.
Selecting employee populates employee details section with ID, Department, Designation, Joining date
Live preview updates when employee is selected
Shows company letterhead (D&V Business Consulting)
Populates template placeholders with employee data
Preview shows: Date, Employee Name, Department, CTC, Location, etc.
Download button visible and functional
Print button visible and functional
Copy button also available for copying content
Generate document button works with selected employee
CTC Designer page at /ctc-designer loads correctly
Employee selection dropdown works
Annual CTC input field available
CTC Components configuration panel available
Preview Breakdown and Submit for Approval buttons functional
Verified in code: HROnboarding.js lines 1890-1913
Design CTC Structure button navigates to /ctc-designer?employee={id}
Generate Documents button navigates to /document-builder?employee={id}
Both buttons have proper data-testid attributes
Login input placeholder shows: 'EMP001 or email@domain.com'
Successfully logged in with Employee ID format (EMP011 / Welcome@EMP011)
Successfully logged in with email format (admin@dvbc.com)
Login page shows helpful text about first-time login with Employee ID

critical_code_review_comments: DocumentBuilder.js: Well structured with DOCUMENT_TYPES array and DEFAULT_TEMPLATES object
DocumentBuilder.js line 569-575: SelectItem correctly displays Employee ID, Name, and Department Badge
Login.js line 51-54: Properly handles both email (@) and employee_id login with toUpperCase() conversion
HROnboarding.js lines 1890-1913: Success dialog has both CTC Designer and Document Builder navigation buttons
context_for_next_testing_agent: Document Builder page fully functional with 4 document types, employee selection with ID badges, live preview, and download/print capabilities. Login supports both Employee ID and Email formats. Onboarding success dialog correctly links to CTC Designer and Document Builder.
